TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDsigC14NTransform extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform

summary.span: 表示數位簽章的 C14N XML 規範化轉換 (不含註解)，如全球資訊網協會 (W3C) 所定義。

span.span: Represents the C14N XML canonicalization transform for a digital signature as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), without comments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表描述 XML 文件的標準格式 C14N XML 規範化轉換。The class represents the C14N XML canonicalization transform that describes the canonical form of an XML document. 這項轉換可讓以建立摘要 （用來建立數位簽章） 的簽署者使用的 XML 文件的標準格式。This transform allows a signer to create a digest (used to create a digital signature) using the canonical form of an XML document. 收件者接著可確認 XML 數位簽章和相同的轉換使用相同的標準格式的 XML 文件。A recipient can then verify the XML digital signature using the same canonical form of the XML document with the same transform. 使用類別時，您需要登入不包含註解的 XML 文件。Use the class when you need to sign an XML document that does not contain comments. 在大部分情況下，不需要進行規範化轉換類別的新執行個體。In most cases, a new instance of a canonicalization transform class is not required. 若要指定規範化轉換，將說明要轉換的統一資源識別元 (URI)屬性，這是從存取屬性。To specify a canonicalization transform, pass the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the transform to the property, which is accessible from the property. 若要取得規範化轉換的參考，請使用屬性，這是從存取屬性。To acquire a reference to the canonicalization transform, use the property, which is accessible from the property. 描述 URI類別由定義欄位和欄位。The URI that describes the class is defined by the field and the field. 您只需要建立手動雜湊的 XML 文件，或使用您自己的標準化演算法規範化轉換類別的新執行個體。You would only need to create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class for manually hashing an XML document or for using your own canonicalization algorithm. 如需 C14N 轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱章節 6.5 和 6.6.1 XMLDSIG 規格中，可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ World Wide Web Consortium (W3C)。For more information about the C14N transform, see Sections 6.5 and 6.6.1 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. 標準化演算法被定義在 W3C 標準 XML 規格中，將會位於 www.w3.org/TR/xml-c14n。The canonicalization algorithm is defined in the W3C Canonical XML specification, which is available at www.w3.org/TR/xml-c14n. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個範例示範如何使用卸離的簽章的非 XML 資料的簽章。The first example demonstrates how to sign non-XML data using a detached signature. 範例 #1 會 www.microsoft.com 的簽章建立 XML 檔案中，並接著會驗證檔案。Example #1 creates a signature of www.microsoft.com in an XML file and then verifies the file. 第二個範例示範如何呼叫的成員類別。The second example demonstrates how to call members of the class. **範例 #1****Example #1** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CPP/xmldsigdetach.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CS/xmldsigdetach.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/VB/xmldsigdetach.vb#1)] **範例 #2****Example #2** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.XMLDsigC14NTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigC14NTransform/CPP/members.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.XMLDsigC14NTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigC14NTransform/CS/members.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.XMLDsigC14NTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigC14NTransform/VB/members.vb#2)]
